note.p: Administrator. Eagle Insurance Company, 1854. Chief clerk, Mututal Life Office, 1868. Secretary and actuary, London Provincial Law Assurance Society, 1869. Fellow of the Institute of Actuaries. Author of reports on friendly societies and pension funds.
